DataElement.preferredName: Person Current External Household Cigarette Passive Smoke Exposure Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether there is currently weekly of exposure to cigarette, finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking, smoke by a person outside or external to a shared house or dwelling in a person who does not smoke.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Current External Household Cigarette Passive Smoke Exposure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the current exposure to cigarette, finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking, smoke products by a person outside or external to a shared house or dwelling in a person who does not smoke.

Property.preferredName: Current External Household Cigarette Passive Smoke Exposure
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface.:A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes. Household is a common unit for classifying population data.:Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.(NCI):Exposure to tobacco smoke products among individuals who do not smoke. This can result from sharing space with a smoker or from placental transfer from mother to fetus.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface.
A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.
Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.
Exposure to tobacco smoke products among individuals who do not smoke. This can result from sharing space with a smoker or from placental transfer from mother to fetus.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Are you exposed to smoke from
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are you exposed to smoke from another person's cigarettes at least once per week when you are outside of your household
